segments.text: They are a nice middle-aged couple , just like us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If they are just like us , they are not middle-aged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Middle-aged means in the middle , Ethel , middle of life . People don't live to a hundred and fifty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , we are the part on the edge of middle . That's all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you know , we are not middle-aged . You're old , and I'm aging .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , fool ! You're nearly seventy and I'm in the low sixties . Would you like to spend the rest of the afternoon squabbling about this ?
segments.speaker: S1
